Financial performance 8/100

'Financial performance' evaluates teh financials of the building ('building performance' and 'Building value') and teh tennant ('Tennant performance').In addition, given teh impact the local economy can have on tennants and value of the building, the performance of the local economy is taken into account ('Marcoeconomic performance')
